description:
Senior Sales Manager

Opmed.ai is looking for a highly motivated Senior Sales Manager with experience in digital health and SaaS products to join our company, a promising well-funded startup based in Boston. The successful candidate will be responsible for managing and growing key accounts by promoting our healthcare SaaS products to healthcare providers, including hospitals and ambulatory surgical centers.

About the role

We at Opmed.ai are passionate about healthcare operations - our mission is to improve their efficiency and resilience. With the world of health changing around us, we believe it should take center stage as more people use it. The vision of our company is to be a technology engine behind better and more efficient means for healthcare providers to deliver care. The technology we use to achieve this is a combination of AI, Network science, and optimization algorithms, with the goal of optimizing scheduling and operations for a healthier population.

We’re a well-funded startup whose product is deployed at several locations. We have offices open across North America and Israel.

Opmed.ai is proud to be an equal-opportunity employer. We hire talented individuals regardless of gender, race, ethnicity, ancestry, age, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, cultural background, religious beliefs, or any other characteristic protected by federal, state, or local laws.

Responsibilities

Generate revenue to meet and exceed the annual quota.

Identify, generate, and close opportunities from target to closed-won deals, to meet revenue targets.

Prospect to build and maintain your pipeline.

Build, conduct, and follow up on sales meetings, including company presentations, demos, and commercial discussions with champions and C-Level key decision-makers.

Build and execute the sales strategy in your region.

Potentially manage strategic account executives in the future.

Coordinate and report to the internal teams to drive product enhancements and an excellent customer experience.

Requirements

Bachelor's degree in business, marketing, or a related field or equivalent experience

5+ years of experience in healthcare as an individual contributor Sales Executive role for SaaS products in the Healthcare space. At least for two companies.

1+ years of experience managing account executives

Proven experience and success establishing pipeline for a hyper growth business.

Proven results as consistently achieving or exceeding quarterly quotas

Self-motivated, ability to work independently as well as part of a team, have a start-up mentality.

Willingness to travel up to 30% .

We are open to a hybrid or remote working model, depending on the candidate's location and circumstances.

If you are a results-driven Senior Sales Manager with experience in healthcare SaaS and are passionate about improving healthcare outcomes, we encourage you to apply to join our team at Opmed.ai. We offer a competitive salary and benefits package, as well as opportunities for professional development and advancement in a dynamic startup environment.
